reviews.title: Môi trường về tech lẫn mọi người đều tốt
reviews.content:
Liked: The salary is really good, the manager always tries to increase my salary before I request.
There are many training courses about soft skills, celebrated by the CEO, and self-training about technical.
Improvements: Boss is like a sun. Way too hot sometimes. So it's best if he just stays and works from home a couple of days.

reviews.title: Mọi người thân thiện, sếp lắng nghe và luôn khuyến khích thử nghiệm ý tưởng mới.
reviews.content:
Liked: The salary is really good, the manager always tries to increase my salary before I request.
There are many training courses about soft skills, celebrated by the CEO, and self-training about technical.
Improvements: Boss is like a sun. Way too hot sometimes. So it's best if he just stays and works from home a couple of days.
Please keep doing what you are doing :)

reviews.title: Môi trường về tech lẫn mọi người đều tốt
reviews.content:
Liked: The salary is really good, the manager always tries to increase my salary before I request.
There are many training courses about soft skills, celebrated by the CEO, and self-training about technical.
Improvements: Boss is like a sun. Way too hot sometimes. So it's best if he just stays and works from home a couple of days.
Please keep doing what you are doing :)

reviews.title: Mọi người thân thiện, sếp lắng nghe và luôn khuyến khích thử nghiệm ý tưởng mới.
reviews.content:
Liked: The salary is really good, the manager always tries to increase my salary before I request.
There are many training courses about soft skills, celebrated by the CEO, and self-training about technical.
Improvements: Boss is like a sun. Way too hot sometimes. So it's best if he just stays and works from home a couple of days.
Please keep doing what you are doing :)
